pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Cholesky LDL Decomposition of Symmetric Matrices // 'C++' implementation of sparse LDL decomposition of symmetric matrices and solvers described by Timothy A. Davis (2016) https ://fossies.org/linux/SuiteSparse/LDL/Doc/ldl_userguide.pdf. Provides a set of C++ classes for basic sparse matrix specification and linear algebra, and a class to implement sparse LDL decomposition and solvers. See https://github.com/samuel-watson/SparseChol for details.
